1526166631_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body:
Runs fine for me. Boots quick. 

I use it because I tinker a lot and it "just works." Use an apt-cacher-ng on a secondary drive and can update to current instantly from a fresh install.

> [quantumkitty](#comment_77_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEaQbNZu): I have a GTX-1070 and had a complete black screen after installing Nvidia drivers. Very, very disappointing.. but I can wait until the next distro for a fresh install. :P

sudo apt install nvidia-driver-390 is what I use for my 1060
